As the cognitive and behavioral problems worsen, affected individuals increasingly require help with personal care and other activities of daily living.",GHR,progressive supranuclear palsy
How many people are affected by progressive supranuclear palsy ?,"The exact prevalence of progressive supranuclear palsy is unknown. It may affect about 6 in 100,000 people worldwide.",GHR
